name: UDJ01UserFacingExperienceDefinition
doc: Description of settings used to display experiences in the UI and start a new session

ExtraArgs: Extra arguments passed as URL options to the game
LoadingScreenWidget: The loading screen widget to show when loading into (or back out of) a given experience
bIsDefaultExperience: If true, this is a default experience that should be used for quick play and given priority in the UI
bShowInFrontEnd: If true, this will show up in the experiences list in the front-end
bRecordReplay: If true, a replay will be recorded of the game
MaxPlayerCount: Max number of players for this session

methods.name: CreateHostingRequest
methods.doc: Create a request object that is used to actually start a session with these settings
